attributes.action: Give All Women 3 Days Off Of "Paid Leave" A Month During Their Menstrual Cycle!!
attributes.additional_details: Some women can take out their frustrations on their partners, by throwing the nearest objects to hand. They suffer from non-comprising male bosses, who'd much prefer to hire "male staff members," as opposed to "female staff members." Spain is already on its way to granting 3 days off a month to their women, in order to alleviate and address the stigma that women go through & suffer on a monthly basis. It is time for this government to act, & act fast. We need to introduce these legislations now.
attributes.background: Allow women in the UK 3 days off "school & work" to get a respite from debilitating stomach cramps during their period, which is normally between 5 to 7 days. Far too many women suffer bouts of mood swings which sometimes leads to depression and are unable to function to the best of their abilities.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624979

Children can already miss school if they're too ill to go in, which includes when they are suffering period pain or related symptoms.
